titles.title: Mille Lacs Lake Freedom To Fish Act of 2012
Mille Lacs Lake Freedom To Fish Act of 2012
Mille Lacs Lake Freedom To Fish Act of 2012
To amend title 46, United States Code, with respect to Mille Lacs Lake, Minnesota, and for other purposes.
To exempt the owners and operators of vessels operating on Mille Lacs Lake, Minnesota, from certain Federal requirements.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment Discharged.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Subcommittee on Coast Guard and Maritime Transportation Discharged.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. H. Rept. 112-634.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 456.

action.text: Mr. Cravaack moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 5797.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: 8/1/2012--Passed House amended. Mille Lacs Lake Freedom To Fish Act of 2012 - Exempts from certain federal vessel licensing and safety inspection requirements owners or operators of vessels operating on Mille Lacs Lake, Minnesota.
